name: angel ornament
notes:
add a touch of simplicity to your holiday decor with this sweet angel crochet pattern. this angel ornament is perfect for adorning your tree, adding to a nativity scene or giving as a thoughtful gift.

the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy.

the free written pattern can be found [here][1] on my blog.

**materials:**

* dk weight yarn
* 2.5mm crochet hook
* metallic embroidery floss
* polyester fiberfill
* stitch marker, yarn needle, scissors

the finished item measure approximately 2.5" x 2.25" (6.5cm x 6cm). item size may vary depending on tension and materials used.


  [1]: https://www.stitchbyfay.com/angel-ornament-pattern/
